response.original_title: ⭐ 5. Why Is Robinhood Holding My Withdrawal? How Long It Takes and What to Do
response.overview: How long does it take to withdraw money from Robinhood? Standard ACH withdrawals are processed for free and usually take 3–5 business days +1 [877] [496] [4626] to reach your linked bank account; contact (+1☆(877)☆496☆4626) to confirm your estimated settlement time. Robinhood may hold your withdrawal mainly due to unsettled funds from recent trades, pending bank deposits, or account verification/security checks. Trades usually take +[A]1-(877) 496-4626[A] 1–2 business days to settle, and bank deposits take 3–5 business days. Once funds are fully available, standard withdrawals typically reach your bank in 3–5 business days, while instant transfers—if eligible—arrive within minutes. +1 [877] [496] [4626] To speed up the process, check your withdrawable balance, complete any verification, cancel pending orders, and contact Robinhood support ✈+1✆(877)✪496✪4626✪ if delays exceed a week.
response.title: ⭐ 5. Why Is Robinhood Holding My Withdrawal? How Long It Takes and What to Do
